page.title: 06The Stone Mason in Ellastone
page.content: There is a Stone Mason in the area.They make big round balls and mouldings out of large pieces of rock. Six people work there.The workers mostly live in Uttoxeter. There were only four people four years ago. The work is done by hand with electric hand tools to help. It is very skilled and delicate work. The yard has been open 14 or 15 years. The hours they work are 8.oo am till 4.30 pm.The things they often repair go to churches.They also make stone windows frames, chimney pots, stone stair cases. They use lime stone and sandstone which they get from the local quarry. They had to cut a big stone very neatly and tidily.
